parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.26</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Lock/Unlock stabilized camera (in vanilla used currently only for UAVs) to target. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[lockCameraTo]] [target, turretPath] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - UAV </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> target: [[Object]] or [[PositionASL]] - use [[objNull]] for unlocking </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]] - path to the turret with required camera </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>uav [[lockCameraTo]] [vehicle, [0,0]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>uav [[lockCameraTo]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[objNull]], [0,0]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>unlocks the turret</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[camTarget]] [[camSetTarget]] [[camPrepareTarget]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<dt class="note">[[User:Commy2|Commy2]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
The vehicle has to have a stabilized optic for this command to work with ASL position.
